title: SUSE Unveils Cloud Native Innovations at SUSECON 2025
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: SUSE is double-downing on its Rancher/StackState cloud native technologies in its drive to become a cloud native corporate power.
cntitle: SUSE 在 SUSECON 2025 大会上发布云原生创新成果
cndescription: SUSE 正在加倍投入其 Rancher/StackState 云原生技术，以推动其成为云原生企业强国。
